title: Ticket #5881: 32-bit and 64-bit Windows builds should have different CondorPlatform
description:
Currently, the CondorPlatform string on Windows builds is X86_64_WindowsN for batlab builds, and X86-WINDOWS_N.M for non-batlab builds. This string does not vary between 32-bit builds and 64-bit builds.

Once we release 64-bit Windows builds, we need to have this string vary. So the 32-bit builds should be changed to they always show X86_Windows*, and the 64-bit builds should always show X86_64_Windows*.
remarks:
It needs to be mentioned in release notes that 32-bit builds will now show a CondorPlatform of X86 rather than X86_64.
